metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000873 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Fasterxml Jackson version Before 2.9.8 contains a CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Jackson-Modules-Java8 that can result in Causes a denial-of-service (DoS). This attack appear to be exploitable via The victim deserializes malicious input, specifically very large values in the nanoseconds field of a time value. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 2.9.8.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
